verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You have settled it
You have settled it
My problems, my challenges
You have settled it
My battles, My victory Lord
You have settled it

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You have won it all
You have won it all
Mountains, battles trials
You have overcome
Overcomers you have made us...Lord
You have won it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This is my praise
This is my worship
This is my praise Lord
You settled it
